channel.title: AXRATEGY Insights
channel.description: AI automation, business systems, and growth strategies for small businesses. Learn how to capture more leads, automate follow-ups, and scale your operations.

item.title: How to Respond to Leads in 8 Seconds (Even at 3am)
item.description: Harvard found businesses that respond in 5 minutes are 100x more likely to close. Here's how to respond in 8 seconds.
item.author: hello@axrategy.com (Ali Ansari)

item.title: 5 Automations That Save 10+ Hours/Week (Copy-Paste Ready)
item.description: Stop manually entering data. These 5 Zapier workflows pay for themselves in the first week.
item.author: hello@axrategy.com (Sarah Chen)

item.title: Why 5 Minutes is Too Slow: The Speed-to-Lead Data
item.description: Responding in 60 seconds increases conversion by 300%. Here's the system that makes it automatic.
item.author: hello@axrategy.com (Ali Ansari)

item.title: Why "Pretty" Websites Don't Sell (And What Does)
item.description: Your designer made it look amazing. But visitors aren't booking. Here's why aesthetics alone fail.
item.author: hello@axrategy.com (Marcus Cole)

item.title: The 3-Text Sequence That Revives Dead Leads
item.description: Your old leads aren't dead. They're just dormant. This SMS sequence wakes them up.
item.author: hello@axrategy.com (Sarah Chen)

item.title: ChatGPT vs. Claude for Sales Copy: Head-to-Head Test
item.description: We tested both AI models on real sales emails. The winner might surprise you.
item.author: hello@axrategy.com (Ali Ansari)
